home.lead: PreKantin helps you order food and drinks from the canteen ahead of time, so your break isn’t spent just waiting in line.
home.why.mahasiswa.title: Your Break Time is Valuable, Don’t Waste it Queuing!

home.why.mahasiswa.desc.strong: how much time is wasted just waiting in long canteen lines?

about.desc1: PreKantin is an early food ordering platform designed for the campus environment. We help students, lecturers, and staff to order their favorite food from campus canteens faster, easier, and more conveniently.
about.desc2: To create a smarter, faster, and more connected campus canteen experience through technology that bridges the needs of students and food vendors. PreKantin aims to establish an efficient, comfortable culinary ecosystem on campus that supports the digital development of all parties.
about.desc3: PreKantin's mission is to simplify dining activities on campus through a fast, efficient, and user-friendly digital platform. We strive to reduce long queues at the canteen by providing a practical and organized food ordering system. Additionally, PreKantin is committed to empowering canteen vendors with technology that helps them manage orders more easily and modernly. Through this initiative, we aim to create a comfortable dining experience for students while supporting the sustainable operation of campus canteens towards a smarter and more efficient digital era.
